Package com.markgrand.smileyvars

This is the main package for SmileyVars.

The main class for using SmileyVars directly is SmileyVarsTemplate

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MapSetter
    MapSetter is used to set the parameters of a SmileyVarsPreparedStatement from Maps that contain pairs of column names and values.
    MapSetter.Builder
    Builder class for creating MapSetter objects.
    SmileyVarsPreparedStatement
    SmileyVars enabled version of a prepared statement.
    SmileyVarsTemplate
    SmileyVars is a lightweight template engine for SQL.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DatabaseType
    Enumeration of database types that a SmileyVar can be specialized for.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoFormatterException
    This is thrown to indicate that SmileyVars have a value to format as an SQL literal, but no registered formatter to format it.
    SmileyVarsException
    Superclass of all exceptions explicitly thrown by SmileyVars.
    SmileyVarsSqlException
    Unchecked exception that is thrown by SmileyVars when there is an SQLException.
    UnboundVariableException
    This is thrown to indicate that no variable has been supplied for a variable that is not inside smileyVars brackets
    UnsupportedFeatureException
    This is thrown to indicate that SmileyVars feature is not yet supported.
